=Example: Greetings, program! (Dynamic)=

* settings.py

{{{
SIMPLATE_DIRS = (
     '/path/to/simplates',
)
SIMPLATE_DEFAULTS = ('index.html',)
}}}


* urls.py

We want these:

{{{
http://www.example.com/greetings/python/
http://www.example.com/greetings/django/
http://www.example.com/greetings/perl/
}}}

To all be served by:

{{{
/path/to/simplates/greetings/program.html
}}}

{{{

from django.conf.urls.defaults import *
from simplates.views import direct_to_simplate


urlpatterns = patterns('',
    ( r'^greetings/(?P<program>[^/]+)/$'
    , direct_to_simplate)
    , {'simplate':'greetings/program.html'}
     )
)

}}}


* Simplate at /path/to/simplates/greetings/program.html:

{{{
"""Python runtime section (think of this as view code)
"""

try:
    program = params['program'] # this comes from the URL per urls.py
except KeyError:
    program = 'program'

#<!--===BREAK===-->
{% comment %}
Django template section (context is namespace from first two sections)
{% endcomment %}

<p>Greetings, {{ program }}!</p>
}}}
